title: [求助] 服务器未知原因崩溃 求解
author: 神奈川归尘
txt_content:
服务器不知为何原因自动关闭崩服了 求助

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
Details:

        Block type: ID #458 (tile.clear_bell // com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.blocks.BlockBell // pixelmon:clear_bell)
        Block data value: 0 / 0x0 / 0b0000
        Block location: World: (99,67,-31), Chunk: (at 3,4,1 in 6,-2; contains blocks 96,0,-32 to 111,255,-17), Region: (0,-1; contains chunks 0,-32 to 31,-1, blocks 0,0,-512 to 511,255,-1)

这个地方方块出错

尝试
config文件夹中的配置文件 config.cfg

B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false

两个都改为true
